lecture.speech: Now, I'll teach you how to control notes.
I know! I can stretch the note to move the mouse while pushing down the left button on the mouse!
You know that very well! But actuary, it's not only secrets about notes.
You can change the position of the notes which is already written on the score.
But, be careful that you can not make notes overlap each other.
I see, and I found that the note makes sound when it changes its pitch.
Moreover, you can double click the note to stretch the note.
By means of them, I can write many kinds of notes!
Yes! Let's write many kinds of notes!
